Uses of Class
Catalano.Math.Matrix3x3

  • Packages that use Matrix3x3 
    Package Description
    Catalano.Math
    The Catalano.Math namespace contains set of math utilities, which are used by other Catalano framework's namespaces or may be used individually.

    • Uses of Matrix3x3 in Catalano.Math

      Methods in Catalano.Math that return Matrix3x3 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Matrix3x3 Matrix3x3.Add(Matrix3x3 matrix1, Matrix3x3 matrix2)
      Adds corresponding components of two matrices.
      static Matrix3x3 Matrix3x3.CreateDiagonal(Vector3 vector)
      Creates a diagonal matrix using the specified vector as diagonal elements.
      static Matrix3x3 Matrix3x3.CreateFromColumns(Vector3 column0, Vector3 column1, Vector3 column2)
      Creates a matrix from 3 columns specified as vectors.
      static Matrix3x3 Matrix3x3.CreateFromRows(Vector3 row0, Vector3 row1, Vector3 row2)
      Creates a matrix from 3 rows specified as vectors.
      static Matrix3x3 Matrix3x3.CreateFromYawPitchRoll(float yaw, float pitch, float roll)
      Creates rotation matrix to rotate an object around X, Y and Z axes.
      static Matrix3x3 Matrix3x3.CreateRotationX(float radians)
      Creates rotation matrix around X axis.
      static Matrix3x3 Matrix3x3.CreateRotationY(float radians)
      Creates rotation matrix around Y axis.
      static Matrix3x3 Matrix3x3.CreateRotationZ(float radians)
      Creates rotation matrix around Z axis.
      static Matrix3x3 Matrix3x3.Identity()
      Provides an identity matrix with all diagonal elements set to 1.
      static Matrix3x3 Matrix3x3.Multiply(Matrix3x3 matrix1, Matrix3x3 matrix2)
      Multiplies two specified matrices.
      static Matrix3x3 Matrix3x3.Subtract(Matrix3x3 matrix1, Matrix3x3 matrix2)
      Subtracts corresponding components of two matrices.
